CustomField.description: Calculated anniversary date based on contract start date and end date. Value will always be the next anniversary future date between the start and end date.
CustomField.formula: IF(NOT(ISBLANK(Apttus__Contract_Start_Date__c)), IF(TODAY() > Apttus__Contract_Start_Date__c, IF((TODAY() - Apttus__Contract_Start_Date__c)/365 < 1, DATE(YEAR(Apttus__Contract_Start_Date__c) + 1,MONTH(Apttus__Contract_Start_Date__c),DAY(Apttus__Contract_Start_Date__c)), DATE(YEAR(Apttus__Contract_Start_Date__c) + CEILING(((TODAY() - Apttus__Contract_Start_Date__c)/365)) ,MONTH(Apttus__Contract_Start_Date__c),DAY(Apttus__Contract_Start_Date__c))) , DATE(YEAR(Apttus__Contract_Start_Date__c) + 1,MONTH(Apttus__Contract_Start_Date__c),DAY(Apttus__Contract_Start_Date__c))), TODAY())
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Calculated anniversary date based on contract start date and end date. Value will always be the next anniversary future date between the start and end date.
CustomField.label: Anniversary Date
